name: Relaxation in VR
description:
Relaxation in Virtual Reality is a virtual island which I created in order to help people release stress and get rid of anxiety disorders. 

My motivation was justified by the fact that nowadays stress affects more and more people who don’t know how to deal with it.

"There's some research that indicates VR is actually more effective at relaxation than traditional cognitive behavioural therapy. It's a great tool for relaxation and we have science to back that up now" ~ Tas Bindi
